text: 10.38: Mt 16.24 naŋga, Mk 8.34 naŋga, Lu 9.23Naŋga kru, nuŋandɨ ahuandɨ maña pɨmɨ kavuta yi naŋga maŋgɨndɨrɨmandɨ hamarɨm, yandɨyɨndu vata maŋambɨrɨman.10.38 Krunavundi muvundumuvundu naŋga sɨmbɨrasara saŋɨŋɨnɨŋ ñamba vana andɨhu Rom hati ahuandɨñɨ taŋgɨraramarasɨmu. Kamata kru kwɨmɨrɨmandɨ varasɨmu hama, nuŋambi nda ahuhɨrɨvɨ ha kavuta taŋgɨraramarama upɨyɨ urasɨmi. Jisas ahuandɨ kavuhavundu tɨhi kuyu ŋguta ambami kanɨŋandɨhin krunavundiŋ pɨmɨ kavuta kɨmuhɨmurɨm mambɨŋitumara vata ambami.
